description: -8TP: All Allies deal Triple Damage.
name: City on Fire

description: +0TP: Party gains +1 TP Regeneration at the start of their turn for 2 turns.
name: Rampant Growth

description: Heals all Allies by 3, reduce Enemy Action Limit by 3, applies 3 Barrier.
name: Academy Manufacturer

description: -1TP: Causes a single enemy to attack its allies for the next turn.
name: Agent of Treachery

description: -4TP: Grants the party immortality until the next turn.
name: Heroic Intervention

description: -2TP: Target ally deals double damage until the end of next turn. They lose life equal to their HP afterwards.
name: Berserk

description:
Push all enemies back by one row. Enemies in the back row gets moved to the front. 
Deals 2 damage to all of them.
name: Modify Memory
note:
<Custom Execution>
let orig1=$gameTroop.rowMembers(1);
let orig2=$gameTroop.rowMembers(2);
let orig3=$gameTroop.rowMembers(3);
$gameTroop.rowMembers(1).forEach(enemy => enemy.setRow(2));
orig2.forEach(enemy => enemy.setRow(3));
orig3.forEach(enemy => enemy.setRow(1));
</Custom Execution>

description:
Deal 5+2*TP damage to one target. Gain Barrier equal to TP. Drains all TP. 
Ignores Row Restrictions.
name: Locus Of Rage
note:
<Custom User Barrier>
   value = user.tp;
</Custom User Barrier>
</Post-Damage Eval>
<Target Action>
animation 129: user
wait for animation
move user: target, front, 30
wait for movement
face user: target
jump user: 250%
motion swing: user
animation 91: target
wait for animation
action effect
</Target Action>

// User vanishes and returns back to home location.
<Follow Action>
move user: return, 30
wait for movement
</Follow Action>
<After Eval>
user.setTp(0);
</After Eval>

<setup action>
perform action
wait: 30
motion thrust: user
move user: target, 60
</setup action>

<target action>
wait: 30
animation 37: user
action effect
wait: 40
move user: return, 60
</target action>

<finish action>
clear battle log
face user: home
perform finish
wait: 20
</finish action>

description:

Where X is the amount of Tricks performed this turn.

for (var i = 0; i < z; ++i) {
